parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Coolant Leaks and Cracked Cylinder Heads
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The coolant leaks and cracked cylinder heads can cause significant overheating, engine damage, and potentially lead to a catastrophic failure, which can result in accidents, fires, or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: Coolant leaks
overheating
engine warning light
abnormal noise
coolant leaking onto the oil filter and exhaust
engine failure
and inability to start the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The internal cracks in the infotainment screen can cause distractions while driving, obstruct the view of the backup camera, and affect the overall usability of the screen.
symptoms: Internal cracks or spider cracks on the infotainment screen
often appearing in the top left corner or edges
which can spread over time; inability to use certain features like GPS or backup camera due to cracks.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the Mazda Smart Braking System can cause false warnings, prevent the use of cruise control, and potentially lead to unexpected braking or loss of control.
symptoms: Front radar warning lights come on after starting the car
even when the windshield and front emblem are clean; funny brake pedal feel when applied; inability to set cruise control.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the infotainment screen can cause difficulty in viewing important information, which can lead to driver distraction and potentially cause accidents.
symptoms: The infotainment screen develops cracks or spidering
making it difficult to see information on the screen.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electrical system can cause the vehicle to not start, leading to inconvenience and potentially stranding the driver.
symptoms: The vehicle will not start after sitting for 24 hours
multiple batteries have been replaced.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Advanced Safety Feature Failure (Lane Assist, Emergency Brake, Lane Departure)
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of advanced safety features can increase the risk of accidents, as the vehicle may not respond as intended in emergency situations.
symptoms: The emergency brake does not engage
lane assist disengages and steers the vehicle into oncoming traffic
lane departure feature fails to alert the driver when a vehicle is in their blind spot.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A vehicle fire can cause damage to the vehicle and potentially harm occupants or bystanders.
symptoms: Flames and smoke appear from the rear passenger side of the vehicle
dashboard warning lights suddenly activate and illuminate.
